Carli Lloyd had her second straight hat trick to lead the United States to an 8-0 victory over Haiti in an exhibition soccer match before 35,753 in Birmingham, Ala. 

Carli Lloyd had her second straight hat trick to lead the United States to an 8-0 victory over Haiti on Sunday in an exhibition match before 35,753 in Birmingham, Ala. 

Lloyd scored all three of her goals in the first half for her fifth international hat trick and second in four days, then sat out the second half. She also made recent appearances, ranging from “Hard Knocks” on HBO to ESPN’s “College GameDay Saturday” before the Mississippi-Alabama football game.
